tika.dc.description: In this sequel to The Hard Word, John Clanchy writes with an engaging blend of ironic humour and compassion as he explores the rapidly changing world of a teenager. On a school trip to the red heart of Australia, Laura suspects her best friend is having an affair with their teacher. She is caught in a tangle of deceit in the inquiry following a young boy's mysterious fall on the slopes of Uluru.
